page.title: 17CRIME
page.content:
{Crime}in the Needwood area is{almost {non-existent}compared with the built up areas of towns and cities.
Police patrol cars go out from a sub station at Barton-under-Needwood. {Reported crimes in 1985}included farm outbuildings vandalised, farm machinery stolen from a field, and some of a flock of sheep missing. Occasionally isolated cottages are broken into and personal property taken. The{thieves}are difficult to trace because they are{seldom local {people.
The{local Police}are always willing to give talks and advice to groups and individuals on crime prevention, and {neighbours keep an alert eye on each {other's property.
